name: Lotus Organizer 5 File
summary: Learn about .OR5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Lotus Organizer 5 was included as part of IBM Lotus SmartSuite 5, also known as Lotus SmartSuite Millennium Edition 9.5.

description: Organizer file created with Lotus Organizer 5, personal information manager (PIM) software; contains multiple types of data, including a calendar, personal contacts, to-do lists, call records, and other information.
